questions.question: What is the dominant color of the phone case's visible material?
What is the apparent primary material used in constructing this phone case?
What shape does the overall outline of the protective case most closely resemble?
Describing the edge profile, is the phone case's border raised or flat?
Considering the visible texture, is the phone case's surface smooth or rough?
What level of transparency does the phone case exhibit, fully opaque, partially, or clear?
Does the case feature any noticeable design patterns or text across its surface?
Based on the image, is the phone case rigid or flexible in its construction?
What appears to be the primary function of this particular item?
Judging by its appearance, is this case designed for a phone or a tablet?
Considering the visual details, does the case completely encapsulate the phone or only partially?
Considering the visible corners, are they rounded, squared, or beveled?
Is the visible surface of the case glossy or matte in finish?
What is the general condition of the shown case, appearing pristine, worn, or damaged?
Given the visible features, is the case designed for a specific phone model, or more generally?
